showcase_Data.project_description: Our name comes from indigenous ecuadorian Kichwa, meaning "delicious water" and refers to the sugary nectar that the hummingbirds sip from small calyxes with their long, thin beaks.

An innovative real state firm with the idea to bring a first class experiences to people who are searching for a house. People can sell and promote their properties throught the web site. I perform branch identity with colors and a overall design to represent the client expectentions.

list_home.description: Fullstack project created using React Redux (Front-End), Express, Node Js and Firebase (Backend)
A simple implementation of a weather app. Created using plain HTML, CSS, and JAVASCRIPT. An weather API is use to get the forecast
